comment.text: This translation key is used to display the label for a toggle switch that enables Single Sign-on authentication. It appears in the UI as a settings category title and is intended to be displayed when the feature is not available. Translators should ensure the text accurately conveys the intent of enabling SSO, while also considering the context in which it will be used.

usage.context:
fontWeight={600}
 lineHeight="20px"
 noSelect
 className="settings_unavailable"
 >
 {t("TurnOnSSO")}
 </Text>
 {!isSSOAvailable ? (
 <Badge
 backgroundColor={
 theme.isBase

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Birdəfəlik Girişli Doğrulamanı aktivləşdirin' is not the most natural or precise translation of 'Enable Single Sign-on Authentication'. While technically correct, it can be improved for clarity and flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'Tək Girişli Doğrulama Aktiv Et' or 'Tək Giriş Doğrulamasını Yandırın'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Habilitar la autenticación de inicio de sesión único' is a literal translation and not the most natural phrasing in Spanish. 'Inicio de sesión único' is technically correct, but 'autenticación de un solo inicio de sesión' or simply 'autenticación SSO' would be more common and understandable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Habilitar la autenticación de un solo inicio de sesión

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Salli vahvistaminen yhdellä sisäänkirjautumisella' is a literal translation but doesn't flow naturally in Finnish. It could be improved for better readability and a more idiomatic expression.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ota yksittäinen sisäänkirjautuminen käyttöön

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'vahvistaminen' (authentication) sounds slightly formal and awkward in this context. A more common and user-friendly term might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ota yksittäinen sisäänkirjautuminen käyttöön

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Միացնել մեկանգամյա մուտքգործման իսկորոշումը' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Enable Single Sign-on Authentication'. While technically correct, it's a bit clunky and verbose. 'Միացնել մեկանգամյա մուտք' (Miatsnel mekangamya mutq) or 'Միացնել SSO' (Miatsnel SSO) would be more common and user-friendly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Միացնել մեկանգամյա մուտք (Miatsnel mekangamya mutq) or Միացնել SSO (Miatsnel SSO)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Abilita l’autenticazione Single Sign-on" is too literal and doesn't flow naturally in Italian. While technically correct, it sounds awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like "Attiva l'autenticazione Single Sign-on" or "Abilita l'accesso tramite Single Sign-on".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ເປີດໃຊ້ການພິສູດຢືນຢັນການເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບດຽວ' is a literal translation and doesn't quite capture the natural phrasing for 'Enable Single Sign-on Authentication' in Lao. It sounds somewhat formal and technical.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like 'ເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ການເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບດຽວ' or 'ອະນຸຍາດການໃຊ້ສັນລະນາມເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບດຽວ' depending on the overall tone and context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'autentifikāciju' is a very literal and somewhat clunky translation of 'Authentication'. A more natural phrasing in Latvian would be 'autentifikāciju' or 'iestatījumus'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Iespējot vienotās pierakstīšanās iestatījumus

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Single Sign-on Verificatie inschakelen' is not the most natural or idiomatic Dutch for 'Enable Single Sign-on Authentication'. While technically correct, it sounds slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A better translation might be 'Single Sign-on Authenticatie activeren' or 'Activeer Single Sign-on Authenticatie'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "Włącz uwierzytelnianie za pomocą pojedynczego logowania" is a very literal and somewhat clunky translation. A more natural Polish phrasing would be more user-friendly. "Pojedynczego logowania" sounds overly formal in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Włącz uwierzytelnianie pojedynczego logowania

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Permitir o Início de Sessão Único' is a literal translation that doesn't flow naturally in Portuguese. While technically correct, it's not the most common or idiomatic way to express 'Enable Single Sign-on Authentication'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Ativar Autenticação de Acesso Único' or 'Habilitar Acesso Único'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'logon único' is a literal translation of 'Single Sign-on' and is not the standard terminology in Brazilian Portuguese. The correct term is 'Single Sign-On' itself or 'Autenticação Única'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'Autenticação Única' or keeping 'Single Sign-On' as is, as it's increasingly common in technical contexts.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Включить аутентификацию с помощью технологии единого входа' is a literal translation and a bit clunky in Russian. A more natural and idiomatic translation would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Включить единый вход (Enable Single Sign-on)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the translation is understandable, it's a very literal translation and might not be the most natural way to express 'Enable Single Sign-on Authentication' in Sinhala. It focuses on 'single entry' rather than 'single sign-on'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation that more accurately conveys the concept of Single Sign-On, such as 'අ egyszer වරම පිවිසීමේ ක්‍රියාවලිය ක්‍රියාත්මක කරන්න' (A ekasa varama pivisumee kriyawalieya kriyathan karanna) - 'Activate the Single Sign-on process'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Omogoči preverjanje pristnosti enkratne prijave' is a literal translation but sounds awkward in Slovenian. 'Single Sign-on' is often shortened to 'SSO' even in translated contexts, especially in technical documentation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Omogoči SSO preverjanje pristnosti

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'preverjanje pristnosti' is technically correct for 'authentication', a more natural term in this context would be 'prijava'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Omogoči SSO prijavo

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and doesn't flow naturally in Serbian. The phrase 'једнократну пријаву (Single Sign-on)' is clunky. While it includes the English term, it disrupts the readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Омогући аутентификацију једнократне пријаве (Single Sign-on)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The inclusion of '(Single Sign-on)' within parentheses disrupts the sentence structure and is stylistically awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: If retention of the English term is necessary, consider placing it in parentheses at the end of the sentence: 'Омогући аутентификацију једнократне пријаве (Single Sign-on)'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'jednokratnu prijavu' literally translates to 'one-time login' which isn't accurate for 'Single Sign-on'. While it conveys a similar concept, it's not the established terminology.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Use 'povezanu prijavu' or 'povezani ulazak' which are closer to the meaning of 'Single Sign-on'. Alternatively, keep 'Single Sign-on' in English, perhaps with a clarifying explanation if necessary. For example: 'Omogući Single Sign-on (povezani ulazak) autentifikaciju'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The inclusion of '(Single Sign-on)' in parentheses is a bit awkward. It's redundant as the Serbian term attempts to explain the English term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing the parenthetical explanation or rephrasing to be more natural. If the English term is retained, ensure consistency in its capitalization.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Увімкнути автентифікацію єдиного входу' while understandable, is not the most natural or concise way to translate 'Enable Single Sign-on Authentication'. A more fluent translation would be 'Увімкнути автентифікацію через єдиний вхід' or 'Увімкнути єдиний вхід'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Увімкнути автентифікацію через єдиний вхід

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Vietnamese translation "Thuật toán giải mã mặc định" translates to "Default decoding algorithm." This is not an accurate translation of "Enable Single Sign-on Authentication." It completely misses the meaning of Single Sign-on (SSO).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be something along the lines of "Bật xác thực Đăng nhập một chạm" or "Kích hoạt xác thực Đăng nhập một chạm", depending on the desired level of formality.
